actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit for retirement income from $1,524 to $5,000.

summary.text: Increases the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit for retirement income allowed under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 from $1,524 to $5,000. Increases such amount from $2,286 to $7,500 in the case of a married couple filing jointly if each of them have reached the age of 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of retirement income eligible for the tax credit for retirement income from $1,524 to $5,000.
